channel.title: Kaggle on Jacques Peeters's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Kaggle on Jacques Peeters's blog

item.title: Kaggle instacart (top2%) feature engineering and solution overview
item.description: Intro This blog post aims at showing what kind of feature engineering can be achieved in order to improve machine learning models. I entered Kaggle’s instacart-market-basket-analysis challenge with goals such as : finish top5% of a Kaggle competition keep learning Python (i come from R) I ended up 52nd (top2%) ouf of 2623 data scientists, which i’m pretty happy with afterwards eventhough i was bitter during the last week because i lost some competitive edges i had due to the release of this and this public posts.
